description: A module for capturing information about an imaging process that assays for the localization of a single target producing data collected in a single channel.
title: single_channel_imaging

channel_identifier.description: An identifier used for this channel within the experiment, e.g. 'red channel' or channel 1.  This should align with the way channels are eferenced in file_names or file manifests.

protocol_type.description: The type of protocol used to assay for the signal in this channel, e.g. smFISH; antibody stain; fluorescent dye. This field is required.

reagent.description: The specific reagent used to detect single in this channel. Examples include, a fluorescent probe used in smFISH; a commercial antibody; a commercial fluorescent dye.
